\section{Question1}

\subsection{Part a}

```{r}
library(faraway)
data(chredlin)
zips <- as.integer(rownames(chredlin))
```

\subsection{Part b}

```{r}
# Fit two models
lmO <- lm(zips~theft + fire, data = chredlin)
lmo <- lm(zips~fire, data = chredlin)
```


\subsection{Part c}

```{r}
# Show the result of the previous step
summary(lmO)
summary(lmo)
```
